mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cboard (m_no, c_title, c_content, c_code) VALUES(#{m_no}, #{c_title}, #{c_content}, #{c_code})
mapper.select: SELECT c.c_no, m.nickname, c.c_title, c.c_rdate FROM cboard AS c LEFT JOIN member2 AS m ON c.m_no = m.m_no ORDER BY c.c_no DESC LIMIT #{calcCount}, #{listCount}
mapper.update: update cboard set c_title = #{c_title},c_code = #{c_code}, c_content = #{c_content} where c_no = #{c_no}
